short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do better, at the right time !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At TabToCal, we fight procrastination 🛟 and we believe in turning information into action.

The only one way on the market to schedule a webpage in any calendar for later browsing.

- TabToCal’s Chrome extension is the easiest, fastest way to save videos, articles, podcasts and more to your calendar – in just one click.
But why should you save them to your calendar instead of just clipping them somewhere as you usually do ? 

- Because even if we feel better at saving something somewhere, we often forget to act upon this content.

- Place a tab at the right moment for you in your calendar is very simple, but yet efficient, and highly productive.

This extension is our way to HELP YOU WALK THE EXTRA MILE 🚶🏾‍♀️, finally.

How ?
1. Download the extension
2. While surfing on Chrome, click on the TabToCal's extension icon
3. Select your agenda, day and time
4. Click on Schedule
5. When time comes, you receive a calendar notification
6. And from any device, you access the information you need at the right time 

And we respect your privacy 🔒 - your calendar remains private, always. 

With 😃 from the Côte de Granit Rose, France
